content.detailedDescription: My wife and i had walked through central park around dusk, the sky was cobalt blue and fading. we were up on the cedar hill area looking towards fifth avenue. i am a serious amateur photographer, and know about reflection of light etc. i used my flash to light up my wife, and balance the fading light. i noticed some dust illuminated...Often orb-like but are pollens etc..I pointed my camera about 30 degrees up towards the buildings to get a photo with the 1st quarter moon which was about 90 degrees up and just over the buildings. i normally use a telephoto lens, with specific settings to lower the shine of the moon, but i used a wide angle lens 24mm at f8 1/80th and wasn't too worried about it being overly bright. (i did use my flash, but the inverse square law would negate any issue as it drops off to 1/100 the power after only 10 feet). i took a few in the exact spot, and took a peek. i suddenly saw this bright light in the top left area! it was not there 1 second prior, nor after. (there were no airplanes or helicopters or drones, and even then, they flash a red warning beacon, not as bright as the moon. it was not a meteor as there would have been more in the photos. i cannot explain what this is! in the photo, you see a cloud and if you look close, 2 orb like reflections, and 1 small one near the bright white light. i have included a photo i took to show the same area w/o the light.
content.summary: Sudden bright light appeared in photo

content.detailedDescription:
I am a keen amateur astronomer with every chance i get i am looking up at the night sky, i've had a great interest in space since being a child, and have always believed our planet can not be the only planet to have intelligent life. i'm 34 years of age now and i can tell the difference between satellites, shooting stars, aeroplane's in the night sky.
i feel that i should explaine this first before i described what myself and a ex work colleague saw this night.
the time must have been about 9:30pm i was stood on my front porch having a cigarette looking at the sky as it was a very clear night. i was looking three stars in particular not for any particular reason tho. they was positioned in a vertical line with centre star off side slightly to the left as i started to look elsewhere in the sky for a few minutes i looked back at these three stars and the central star i noticed was not in off side to the left but  more to the right thinking it must be a different star come in to view but then thinking it's a very clear night and it didn't look right. as i was thinking this the same central star moved to the left then stopped for a few moments and moved again to the right but a lot further this time and stopped again. i knew straight away this was no star despite looking like one when stationary so it's undoubtedly that this object was in space and not in earth's atmosphere.
be totally amazed at this i looked to see if this was the only object moving like this and i spotted one more quiet a distance away it looked the same a small white light moving very fast then slowing down moving zig zagging but this time i could just see a a dim light next to it moving as if it was two objects flying in formation. this was shortly followed by more lights coming in to view and within a hour of myself looking at all this there had must of been over hundred of these lights maybe even more, but what must be understood is that these were not separate sightings this was a mass sightings with all in view together.
some lights had more emerging from them there would be a few grouped together with six to ten lights in formation moving very fast. knowing that i needed to show someone what i was seeing i phoned my friend that lived locally i told him what i was seeing and he come to meet with me 100 yard's from my house and he also witnessed this event, this hole events lasted until the morning as it became lighter due to day light it was then that these mass moving lights became harder to see, i know this event happened through out the whole night as i stayed outside looking at these until the morning.
the following afternoon it was said on the evening news that this was a mass meteor shower witnessed by thousands of people, if this was the case a  meteor shower will all travel in the same direction and will burn up in the atmosphere! this did not happen with these lights i believe that this reason was suggested to stop people from thinking different,my only regret is that i had no camera good enough to view this but on more research i found that a lot if people in the uk did film this event and has been posted on youtube.
content.summary: Mass sighting over hundred lights out of the earth's atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down a suburban area, talking on the phone(bluetooth), and as i was talking and driving i looked up and noticed this odd looking dark rectangle shape in the sky.  it seemed small to me because it was  high up , looked like 1/2 inch big .  it didn't seem to be moving, but stationary...I wondered if it was a kite...But it didn't move like a kite...I just kept staring at it the whole time i was driving, yet i had to also keep my eyes on the road, so i went back and forth watching the road, and staring at this object, that seemed so odd to me...Then when i ended the conversation , i looked up and it was gone...And i looked around as much as i could while driving...But didn't see it again....Then when i got home i googled rectangle shaped ufo's, and found all kinds of these rectangle shaped sightings reported .
content.summary: I was driving, talking on bluetooth, saw this dark rectangle shape high in sky, it was daylight..

content.detailedDescription: I was on the phone with work out my backyard. it was about 5.30 - just hitting dusk for the time year here. i looked up to see a large black diamond/cone shaped object flying from the direction of the airport near by. a few miles away it seemed, maybe more. it appeared to wobble as it moved. it suddenly changed direction and flew nw anyway from me into cloud cover which is when i managed to take picture after trying to end phone conversation! it all happened so fast. a few minutes really. before i knew it it was gone. i live in the country near an airport so use to seeing lights/objects in the sky - i know the difference between planes/birds/satellites/shooting stars. you see them all out here.  99.9% i can explain. this one i can't. the only thing i can think of is a ballon but it seemed too big for a ballon and oddly shaped for one. and balloons tend climb in my experience. i've been going through it in my head as to what it could be for a month now. basically contacting you now to try and explain it instead of going through life thinking i saw a ufo instead of something that can be explained.
content.summary: Saw a large black object coming from north west(direction of an airport) across the front of the clouds.  it then changed direction and headed nw always from me into cloud cover. i

content.detailedDescription:
The national director of mufon australia is registering this report on behalf of the witnesses.

the death of a ram located near geelong in the state of victoris was reported to the national director of mufon australia by private email. along with the message the email contained several digital images of the mutilated animal. 

the death of the animal was estimated to be between 30/09/2016 and 4/10/2016. the animal was 14 months old and weighed approximately 90 kg. the ram did not show any heath problems and did not exhibit any unusual behavior prior to death. the body was found in the west paddock behind the homestead and was not visible from the house.

there was no presence of blood at the site nor was there any blood found on the fleece of the animal. there was no signs of struggle. 

an independent witness who was resident at the homestead on the date of the incident said that he woke up at approximately 4 am on the friday 30th september or saturday 1st of october 2016 (approximate date of death) and saw a "red drone" from the bedroom window which is at the front of the house. he commented that he could see a red drone moving about.

the head of the ram "appeared to have been severed as if by a sword leaving just a strip of flesh attached to the body. the bottom jaw on both sides of ram had just raw bone all flesh and connective tissue was missing and a straight cut was evident above where the flesh and skin had been."

the photographs were shown to a veterinary scientist (comments omitted). 

it was not clear if there were any physical traces left on the grass immediately under the body of the ram.
content.summary: A dead ram was found by owner in the field that had sustained injuries similar to documented cases of animal mutilation found around the globe and the incident is associated with the sighting of a red drone or orb-like light by an independent witness.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my friends at about 12:00am. the orb was hovering above my friend neighbourhood. it hovered then disappeared after about 2min.
content.summary: Bright white orb of light, so bright and had a halo around it and hovered over the neighborhood and disappeared in front of our eyes. there are electrical lines of red green and blue electrical lines it. then it vanished.

content.detailedDescription: Was at riverside goin on a walk through the park and the sky was very clear so took a moment to look up. and i saw four bright orange glowing orbs flying about me. they were swaying back and forth coming from the north skies heading south. the 2 outter orbs were spinning and flipping around eachother as the 2 in the middle did not they made no sound. for that i think they are from out of this world. they glided through the sky smoothly. have always been fascinated by the topic but to see it with my own 2 eyes, my gosh! what an amazing experience!!
content.summary: Four orange orbs flying in a formation and the outter 2 were crossing eachother in spins and flips.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving northwest on highway36 going towards boulder when i noticed a group of old fighter planes flying above me. i immediately opened my camera on my phone and took two quick pictures of them. later on in the day, i looked at the picture and zoomed in to not only see the planes but 2 ufo's flying at a 45degree towards the planes with a trail behind them. that's when i seen 5 more ufo's hovering below the clouds watching on it seemed. i was super excited to see what i captured and couldn't wait to show my family. they think i'm dumb for always watching ancient aliens, and other shows but changed their tune once they seen my picture.
content.summary: I took a picture of fighter planes, with ufo's in it.

content.detailedDescription: At 5:49 pm i heard a loud hovering sound in the sky when i looked up i saw red flashing lights in a triangle shape, the hovering sound lasted for 4 minutes but the red flashing lights lasted for about 6 minutes when i grabbed my phone to record it  but the red flashing lights were gone but i did see some white hovering lights in a triangle shape then it disappeared     i am in porter ranch, california  and saw the lights above the 118 freeway
content.summary: Flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: As baybrook mall security i was coming in to work, looked up and saw orbs hovering. we're gone after clocking in 5min later. checked my the date and time on my phone and also used it to see what direction from the mall they were in. 2 orbs did move as i briefly watched them, one had an after glow
content.summary: Saw orbs on my way in to work

content.detailedDescription: At about midnight we were on the porch and noticed a bright distant object. five of us took turns observing it with binoculars for a hour and a half. it remained stationary during the entire time it was observed. it changed colors and intensity from red to blue to white to green, and combinations of those colors. it was too bright to be a planet. it was at least a couple miles away but the night was clear and with binoculars it was very obviously not a planet or a plane. it was still there when we went to bed. the next night 2 of us observed it again in the same location for an hour. i took 2 photos with my phone. they aren't very clear but they do show some of the color changing.
content.summary: Stationary, changing colors, distant, bright.

content.detailedDescription:
My father and his brothers were out hoeing soybeans or peas on their family farm in northern iredell county, near the stony point community in north carolina one summer day around 1950. my father was about 14 at the time, his brothers were 15 and 12. it was a cloudless day and warm, with fine visibility in all directions, a slight breeze but otherwise still. about noon, shortly before he and his brothers were going to go to their house for lunch, the three of them saw a group of objects due north from where they were working, in the direction of the brushy mountains which were clearly visible that day.

 according to my father, the objects resembled silver coins, about the size of quarters hovering in the distance. the objects were generally featureless, perfect discs, and clearly a bright metallic, and about 5 in number. these objects did not move, but hovered about 10 to 15 degrees above the horizon, or just slightly above the backdrop of the mountains. the three of them observed these objects for about a minute or two, no more than that, before they began to run back towards the house to fetch the pair of binoculars to get a better look at them. it was less than a quarter of a mile between the field and the house,and as the house was due north, the three of them were able to watch the objects the entire way to the house. at no point did these objects move in any significant way other than hover and vibrate slightly (although it could be possible that the shimmering could be due to the bright sunlight on the object's metallic surface). the objects were gone when the three of them came back out from the house, the encounter lasted about twenty minutes altogether.
content.summary: Silver coins hovering in broad daylight

content.detailedDescription: Walking the dogs in the neighborhood and noticed a red light falling fast. kinda thought it was a plane going down then it stopped dead.. went directly east and quickly changed direction and came west toward us. it was really windy here and it wasn't affected by the gusts at all. we kept thinking if it was a drone,it must be huge with a heckuva range.. not sure exactly how to far it traveled but at least a great deal further than i've ever seen a drone capable of. it dropped below the tree line and never reappeared.
content.summary: Free falling, hovering, changed direction quickly and efficiently.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were waiting for the 16 bus to go home after being at the grove. there was another, younger man waiting with us. suddenly from out of thin air comes this white disc. it's flight path took it behind a telephone pole across the street, but it never came out the other side. the young gentleman asked me if i had seen it. i asked him what he saw, which was close to what i had seen, but he felt the color was more green, but agreed on the silence, speed and zero contrails or sparks. i have seen bolides many times and i guarantee it was no bolides.
content.summary: White lenticular shaped craft appeared and disappeared in less than two seconds

content.detailedDescription: This is a resubmission of my past posting with editing notes for clerification.  i was informed by a mufon investigator that he was unable to see the objects i described in my photos.  driving on the meadowbrook parkway north i saw a white orb so i took a picture.  then throughout the day, i took other pictures in different locations at various times.  my pictures include sightings form the meadowbrook parkway north and south, loop parkway and lido blvd.  my personal observations only revealed 1 or 2 orbs.  my pictures however showed a lot more detail such as multiple orbs blue and white, a white triangle, a white curved line and a purple rectangle.  as observed in my prior posting, a large orb was directly above the sun and smaller ones scattered. i wanted to make sure my phone camera was taking accurate photos so i called a friend approximately 18 miles from where i was and asked her to take some pictures of the sun.  like mine, her pictures showed a large orb directly over the sun and smaller ones scattered, however the large orb in her photos had a purple light surrounding the large white orb.  i suspect that these orbs around the sun have been hanging out in that location on a daily bases for some time.  i think it would be a great idea for everyone reading this post to take some pictures of the sun and if any orbs or other objects are observed to post them on this site. my last attached photo is the one my friend took with her phone camera.  try to expand the photos when viewing to see the details better.  i apologize if some of my photos are redundant but i am new at locating and posting photos.
content.summary: I am resubmitting my photos becasue an investigator assigned to my case was unable to see what i described as seeing.  i edited the photos to clearify what i believe i saw

content.detailedDescription:
When viewing the video, please zoom in to the upper right corner of the building with your smart phone or tablet...It is very hard to distinguish from the regular view.  i also apologize in advance for turning my phone sideways while i was filming!!  :)  here is the story....
i was driving in my minivan with my two daughters, dropping my 9 year old son off at swimming at 6pm. it was dusk, but still light outside. we noticed a plane with a small trail traveling west very high..There was a bright star-like light underneath it. i told him it could be a star, or a planet...Not necessarily a ufo.  we figured it was not a plane, because it did not seem to be moving and did not have any blinking lights.  my son suggested i take a photo of it "just in case", so i grabbed my phone, however when we both looked again 2 seconds later, the plane with the trail was still there, but the star-like light  was gone.  i thought it odd that the light disappeared so quickly.  (that it didn't fade first or move to a different direction)
later that evening when we picked him up from swimming at 7:42pm, it was dark outside.  after getting him in the car, i purposely drove to an adjacent parking lot where we could get a good view of the west horizon, to quickly see if there was anything "going on" in the sky.  as i turned the vehicle around, i saw something bright in the distance out of the corner of my eye.  i continued to turn my car so i could get a good view and could not believe my eyes when i saw multiple very bright lights huddled together in the far, distant horizon.  they were low, just above the distant treeline.  we were facing sw.  while they look small in the video, you could tell the lights were covering quite a large area, spaced apart, and very bright...They seemed to be pulsing slightly (maybe?)...They definitely were not static.  they lit up the whole area where they were located.  they were making the triangular and chevron shapes and i literally could not believe this was happening.  when you hear the audio you will laugh at both of our responses to what we were seeing.  i continued to film them.  some moved to the left out of our site around a distant building.  there were any planes in the sky that night, as it was friday night in chicagoland.  my thought was that these lights looked exactly like many of the recent ufo videos i have been seeing lately...Charlotte nc, and others that i have looked up online in the past few years.  my son agreed...He could not believe his eyes.  my other thought was that they were stacked up planes flying toward us.  i do believe a couple of the outskirt lights were actually planes flying in to land at midway or ohare, maybe at first coming toward us, then circling around.  but as i kept watching them, they were just too strange looking and too stationary for too long of a time.  my son started dying of thirst and my girls were getting antsy, so i had to finally reluctantly leave the scene. but by that time, as you will see, the lights had pretty much left my sight or were fading away.    
what was making this whole event even more strange to me, was that i have been extremely interested in ufo's for the past month or longer.  i've always had an interest as a child and teen, but my interest (even more of a recent obsession) was rekindled a month and a half ago when i watched a documentary on netflix, and with the recent releases of wikileaks emails from john podesta.  i have been researching recent reports and sightings on the internet every spare moment i had, and believe this or not, but i felt like "something was going to happen" for the past several weeks. (it has been my experience that when i have this feeling about anything, something does happen) but this feeling was not necessarily a good feeling...I have been kind of unnerved and weirded out by this feeling and this new/old obsession.  anyway, it is because of this, that i had to literally blink several times during this sighting, because i just could not believe i was witness to this so early on in my obsession!  :)   if it was stacked up planes, so be it, but i do believe that the more i look in the future, the more i will find, and that is very exciting to me!!!!
content.summary: Bright series of lights in very distant horizon, just over trees. changed shape, made chevron form, pulsed slightly, eventually dispersed.  lit up that area.  very far away, but clear to me and my 9 year old son.

content.detailedDescription: Noticed double circles across the road then seen what looked like reptilian like beings in the tree line. i looked up and noticed a disk like object just below the tree line. it was very foggy this morning so i went outside to see if i was really seeing what i took pictures of. while i'm writing this at 10:46am there is a helicopter going over my house. i did see this with my naked eye.I see these rings daily around my house for the past month.
content.summary: Dome like craft double circles entities observed while looking out the window of my home.

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting in a store parking lot, leaning against my car and looking at the cirrus cloud whisps. i noticed a bright pinpoint.  it went behind the high cloud but was still faintly visible.  when the cloud passed, it was still there and i spotted eight other stationary lights/reflections nearby, so i grabbed my phone to take a pic so i could zoom in.  i googled iridium flare, just to try to explain.
content.summary: I was leaning against car. when i noticed more lights far above cirrus clouds, i grabbed my camera.

content.detailedDescription:
1st sighting:

01/10/2016
i was near to the port at the afternoon with my friend and we were going for a walk. one time we talked about cameras of phones and i take a photo with my smartphone camera at 20:50 in afternoon. after a while i showed him the picture that i took. at first time we thinked this is a reflection from lights near from the port of nea moudania. when i arrived to my home, i saw again the picture and i saw the picture carefully. i realized that is 3 object looks like stars (at this time only one star or planet was visible) with orange lightenings like orange dots. with naked eye the objects didn't visible. i didn't see these object next days at the same place.

2nd sighting:

20/10/2016
i and my friends we were going to drink coffee and have fun. it was 23:30. i and my friends started taking selfies with their phones. i just took a picture with my smartphone to show to my friends how well take photographs my smartphone. then i saw the picture and i saw. i saw 2 objects with orange lights looks like dots or missiles, i don't know, and one object with 3 white lights that looks like a triangle shaped object or something other. the objects is not visible with naked eye. so after that when i took a picture of  my friends, the objects was disappeared.
content.summary: 2 sightings caught on camera

content.detailedDescription: Standing on my steps taking pictures of the sky, the sky is usually more clear early in the mornings. it's about 7:20am. i took a free pics and then came in the house to view them, after viewing them i noticed what look like a huge planet with a horizon in the background , and that orb that appeared to move around and then disappeared. so i went back outside to take more pics to see if i could see that planet or the orb again. however, what i saw after viewing the second set of pics was the orb appears to either have been separated or joined by other orbs and the lights look too be arranged in some type of formation , or a triangular ship.  i thought that it might be reflective lights on the cameras lens, but it just looks suspicious.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Taking pics of the sky and spotted what looks like a planet in the background, then the orbs , went back outside to take more pics and orbs separated

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Within 7 minutes saw 4 "shooting stars" and then saw this cone looking pointed thing slowly roam across the sky. the first point was very bright and as the wings flowed the rest of the objects dimmed. lit up the majority of the sky. it was too large and didn't blink like an airplane would. as soon as i pointed it out to my mate, it disappeared right in front of us.
content.summary: Resembled a form like birds flying south. had a point at its brightest and the rest dimmed as it went down.

content.detailedDescription: I thought i was watching an airplane come toward me while i was attending an all souls procession concert event. at the even they were hanging a giant glowing orb in the sky with a crane (at night). there were many people dressed in costume and dancing and singing. there were 2 red lights and 2 white lights on the craft as it came south towards the event i was watching. i was looking to the north. as it got closer the two white lights went out and the 2 red ones stayed on. the lights got nearly overhead and then hovered and ascended. then it backed out in the direction it came from and the 2 white lights came back on. the craft moved out to the north. at one point the lights seemed to dance in a random way and then the craft disappeared into space.
content.summary: 4 lights incoming from the north, 2 red and 2 white. white lights go off and two red lights come over us.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my front yard and am always looking at the sky.
it was a bright silver moving object.
at first i didn't know what it was but was thinking it was a missile,as it got closer then i know.
the object was moving north west from mexico towards some strange clouds.
when i seen it my first thought was a missile but then i could make out a rounder image.
i was a little excited at first but this was not the first time.
lost it in the clouds.   



please let me know what you see in this photo.
content.summary: I spotted a silver object moving north from mexico that was not man made, by the time i focused my phone i could not see it. i did get a photo hoping to see it on my computer, after looking at the photo i could make it out.

content.detailedDescription: Driving north on highway 69 near petersburg, in at night. after driving under a overpass, saw a white light hovering in the east. it then starting moving at an incredible velocity across the sky, toward the ground, at a 45 degree angle. the white light was constant. it didn't flash. the object had no tail. it sped across the sky until the light went out above the tree tops. it was quite a distance away from me when it vanished. i immediately tried to call someone to tell them about what i had seen, but my phone wouldn't call for several minutes. when i hit call, it wouldn't ring. overall, very unsettling experience.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright white light moving at an incredible velocity, first hovering, then started zooming at a 45 degree angle toward ground

content.detailedDescription: I was aboard amtrak from ny to fl when i was taking pics of the,sky & water. i didnt notice the object until after i got home, months later while reviewing the pics. the details on the pic was that it was taken in fort lincoln, washington, dc on august 2nd, 2016 @ 8:51am. i had experienced some interfernce with my cellphone reception but @the time i ignored it. i have 2 other pics, 1 before & 1 after where the object doesn't appear @ all. i'm just curious as to what it is? in the pic it looks like its hovering above the busy bridge.
content.summary: Unknown object hovering over a bridge in fort lincoln, washington, dc

content.detailedDescription: We were driving east, passing edwards air force base and i noticed an object traveling very fast across the highway. it had a wobble to it because the suns reflection wasn't constant and it couldn't be seen unless it tilted. i happened to take two pictures of it while it was reflecting the sun with my canon digital camera. i have raw images that can be examined further, but will only submit a jpeg at this time due to the size of the raw image. it was moving too fast to get a good focus and i did not have time to make proper adjustments to capture a moving object. raw image can be sent if you would like ...
content.summary: Sun reflecting off it caught my eye as it sped by.

content.detailedDescription: The object silver stay in the air 15 sec over 1 mile far the water and disapear fast
content.summary: The object silver flight under the river and 15 sec its dissapear wow

content.detailedDescription: The object silver stay in the air 15 sec over 1 mile far the water and disapear fast
content.summary: The object silver flight under the river and 15 sec its dissapear wow

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home at sunset heading directly into the sun, every night approx 45 min before sunset, the western sky is filled with chem trails hiding the sunset, i was wearing military grade sunglasses and did not put the cars sun visor down and right before sunset i saw a small vertical rainbow, i decided to take some pictures of it.

i saw it for about 20 minutes and pulled over to take more pictures, and the entire time the chem trails were still filling in every minute blue spot in the sky, 

the western sunset was the only part of the sky with cloud cover, the chem trails were being formed not by aircraft but more like an aerosol propellant which dissipated when empty..
when i looked at the photos later that night i saw an object in the center of the rainbow that either reflected light or produced its own light and reflected off the hood of my car.
it stays equidistant from the sun and sets with the sun.

i tried to post this a few days ago but my internet service is not quick enough to upload all the pictures and uploading failed so this time i will only load two, and hopefully send the rest by several emails 

what i thought was a small vertical rainbow had an object in the center and reflected light,
content.summary: Close to the sun during sunset, looked like small vertical rainbow in glare of sunset

content.detailedDescription: Oct 24th 2016. brick nj on drump point rd. myself and two others were leaving work out of the back door. as i was about to lock the back door, i couldn't remember a 100% if i had locked front doors. so i asked the one guy with us if he can go check. as he went in the lady i was with had said to me sounding startled. omg what's that pointing up. when i looked up i saw a fire ball. coming from roughly the nw area. first thought was a ufo. as i have seen many videos and documentarys about sightings. i immediately remembered seeing other videos about the same thing i'm witnessing. as it comes closer i try and quickly grab my camera to record. as i get my phone out it it just about above us. watching on my phone while recording it looked more like a firey plasma ball rotating and pulsating wihile moving sort of se strait over head. no noise no trail no planes or helicopters. the sky seems silent. there were some clouds in the sky not to many. besides, this object was well underneath the clouds. as the object was just about out of view the guy who checked the doors comes back out. as the girl and i are starring up in total shock and awe on what we saw. he was only able to see the last few seconds. it was a very peaceful , beautiful and surreal moment. i myself am and always have been a believer that something else has to be out there.  i just wish i would see more things like i did that night.
content.summary: Silent, plasma/fire ball across the sky almost over our heads. pulsating and rotating slightly changing size and shape. mostly a sphere though. very surreal. did some research and noticed there was a very similar sighting in pa, md and sc i believe.
